title: NEED BF 4 CHRISTMAS SKINS
body:
GUIS I NEED A BOYWEND IDK HOE TO GET A BOYFWEND FOR JESUS CHRISTMAS DAE

I THOT BOYS LIKD HOT GAMER GRILS 
IF U GIFT ME GOOD SKINS I WILL BE UR GF
I KNO ITS A BOY NEM BUT MY NEM IS ACTIALLY GIRL NAME (ARISSAA) AND I WOOD LIK TO MEK SOME SKIN REQUISTS:

- ARCADE MISS FORTUNE
- DRAGON TRAINER TRISTANA
- EL TIGRE BRAUM
- HEARTSEEKER VARUS
- TUNDRA FIZZ
- OMEGA SQUAD TEEMO
- WARRING KINGDOMS KATARINA 

YOU CAN BY MY LUV <333333 XOXOX
REMEMBER TO RESERVE THE SKIN UR GETTIG ME IN COMMANTS <3 <3
I PROMIS WILL BE UR GF IF YOU GIFT ME FOR CRISTMAS COZ I AM POOR AN WANT A BF

NO H8 PLZ I JUS WANT LUV
THANK YOU FOR READING!!!! <3 XOX :3 :* C: XD
